activities: The Laboratory for Personalized Molecular is a clinical reference lab testing patient samples for various molecular markers of cancer. We store and transmit patient results in our IT systems. We do not collect personal information through our website, nor do we ever share any personal information except with authorized parties (i.e. physician and health care facilities)
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Personal Health Records, Clinical Trial Data, Client Information
